title: 294: Bachelor in Paradise: Ep 2 & 3 (WTF! Why Is Everyone Acting Like They’ve Never Met!)
itunes:title: 294: Bachelor in Paradise: Ep 2 & 3 (WTF! Why Is Everyone Acting Like They’ve Never Met!)
description:
The Broads recap the latest episodes of BIP and things are starting to heat up! They discuss the Demi entrance and go into the past receipts regarding Brendan and Pieper’s relationship and their theories. They chat about Victoria P’s boyfriend and “Jordan”, their strong opinions on the Thomas situation, Riley and Maurissa falling in love, and a whole lot more!
